patch:
@@ -11,67 +11,68 @@ micronaut:
         descriptions: true
         step: PT1M
 
-connector:
-  pipelines:
-    - name: "mysql-pipeline"
-      meta:
-        replicas: 1
-      source:
-        type: FileSource
-        config:
-          path: src/test/resources/observer-0.6.5/testfiles
-      decoder:
-        type: AvroDecoder
-      buffer:
-        maxItems: 100
-        maxWaitingTimeInS: 10
-      sink:
-        type: JDBCSink
-        config:
-          datasource: "mysql"
-          SQLDialect: "MYSQL"
-          schemaCheck:
-            enabled: True
-            createTableIfNotExists: True
-            createDatasetIfNotExists: True
-    - name: "postgres-pipeline"
-      meta:
-        replicas: 1
-      source:
-        type: FileSource
-        config:
-          path: src/test/resources/observer-0.6.5/testfiles
-      decoder:
-        type: AvroDecoder
-      buffer:
-        maxItems: 100
-        maxWaitingTimeInS: 10
-      sink:
-        type: JDBCSink
-        config:
-          datasource: "postgres"
-          SQLDialect: "POSTGRES"
-          schemaCheck:
-            enabled: True
-            createTableIfNotExists: True
-            createDatasetIfNotExists: True
-
